org.xbib.marc.io

Class SeparatorInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.xbib.marc.io.SeparatorInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SeparatorInputStream
extends java.io.FilterInputStream
    An unbuffered separator stream. This is a very slow implementation. Use this only if BufferedSeparatorInputStream is not possible.
